title: When your team calls you shit for picking an off meta champ but you end up carrying them

If someones a jerk and makes another person go on tilt, that person can't just push a button and go off tilt because the other guys not being a jerk anymore.  The damage was already done.  You're gonna give em a free pass for being a bigot just cause they temporarily stopped being one?  You guys being so lenient is the biggest reason why this place is such a dreadful mass of stress and rage.
AP Leona Mid, dude.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Meowriko,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PFt8ParB,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-04-06T17:17:45.324+0000)

> Everyone yelled at him in champ select.
> He carried hard and we won.

Did they play AD or AP Ashe?   What was the match up?  I love Ash, but feel like there are better ADC's in bot lane.  Have been experimenting with mids to not a great degree of success.

Only Ashe's ult scales off of AP, so I see no real reason to go AP Ashe. I actually enjoy Ashe mid as well, she's a good counter to certain team comps (unfortunately, the new tank meta is not one of them). I usually build Tear, Brutalizer, Last Whisper, CDR boots, then finish Manamune as my core. Then the rest of my items I'll build based on matchups. Going against champs like Fizz mid get wrecked by Ashe in my experience.

You could experiment as Support Ashe. She has good poke and peel, and you actually get to make use of her passive, if nothing else. Items like Zeke's Herald, Black Cleaver and Runaan's hurricane help you become a true AD support. Early game, i'd suggest starting out with the relic shield or the coin.
I tried {{champion:22}} support with {{champion:119}} ADC against {{champion:53}} support and {{champion:22}} ADC. By 20-ish minutes, our support was doing more damage than enemy ADC.

{{champion:432}} main's life.
Support, toplane, jungle, bring it
Is your buddy Hyrum?
You know him? Haven't seen him on in a while.
Funnily enough, he actually commented on the same comment that I did.  Yeah I sorta know him, we don't talk much anymore, but he's a really great guy.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Meowriko,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PFt8ParB,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-04-06T17:17:45.324+0000)
> /sunglasses

rito pls.
Pls. We need it.

My friend once played Attack Damage Janna Jungle, in Ranked Solo Queue. He told me that his teammates had no faith in him, and even stole his jungle camps at level 1. Then he, playing AD Janna, got a quadra kill during a team fight. Always trust your teammates.
I don't understand that logic of "i don't like your pick because I think it makes us less likely to win, so I'm going to try to screw you over so now we have even less chance of winning.

it's so when they lose, they can blame the loss on the one guy and deflect all responsibility, thus reinforcing this logic the next time it happens to justify it.

I think it's confirmation bias, or something. People will forget the 100 times breaking the meta works, and focus on the one time it didn't.

Trinity Force Miss Fortune.
Had someone threaten to come over to my house and kill me if I dared to finish it (Had Phage and Sheen done).

Final build:

Blade of the Ruined King
Trinity Force
Berserker's Greaves - Homeguard
The Black Cleaver
Wit's End
Runaan's Hurricane
Farsight Orb (upgraded blue trinket)

Went 15/7/16 with 17.1k gold at the end.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1765946531/35769681

That Nasus got like 700 stacks. :|

>Had someone threaten to come over to my house and kill me if I dared to finish it (Had Phage and Sheen done).

Ah, nothing like threatening to commit a criminal offense because you didn't like the item build of some anonymous player in a video game.

Stay classy, folks.
i still remember when some guy shot his roommate for rolling on a legendary item in wow and winning it... people are dumb when it comes to videogames sometimes

As a MF main I feel safe to say she's one of the strongest ADCs in game right now. You can pretty much build any AD item in any order and carry. You can't really totally counter build her since her auto attacks and abilities both do mixed damage (yes MF auto attacks do magic damage too)

The tri force is the least offensive part of the build. wits end is ok i guess...but you built basically:
30%
25%
50%
70%
40%
---------------
215% attack speed....if you just replaced one of those with some damage, i think you would find it would work out a little better.

personally id drop the wits end or hurricane for an infinity edge

The idea, I think, was the on-hit effects applied through Runaan's.
42 Magic Damage, 5 MR reduction/increase, 5% armor reduction and 8% physical current health dmg for each attack on up to 3 targets (4 with MF's Q).

As for the attack speed: MF's base attack speed is 0.656. Bonus through lvl 18, items and AS quints: 279.7%, being 1.834832 -> 2.490832 in total, which is close to the cap, but it doesn't exceed it.
The bigger problem is probably the lack of immediate armor/magic penetration. If you can't just stand there and attack for the Wit's End/Cleaver stacks, everything remotely tanky will just shrug it off like a late-game Janna AA. And the single-target damage, of course, which is ultimately pretty low compared to a standard ADC build. It has it's merits - and it's flaws. ;>
wait you mean you got a death threat in the internet?  Quick set up a patreon/kickstarter and get all them victim bucks to raise awareness about discrimination against trinity force ADC's
i give my teammates a chance, unless they go AP {{champion:238}}...
"The unseen build, is the deadliest."
"...to me, in this instance."
"Ain't I a stinker?"

Mid Karma

"She can't wave clear and she falls off"

Well not when she scales mid game harder than most mages and can roam as fast as an assassin. Also she counters assassins. People forget that a devastating early and mid game can prevent a late game. All you need is pressure.

> Well not when she scales mid game harder than most mages and can roam as fast as an assassin. Also she counters assassins. People forget that a devastating early and mid game can prevent a late game. All you need is pressure.

Can't waveclear? Who the fuck said that? Rofl.
Karma Mid is legit one of the scariest mid laners to go against, really don't know why people hate her out of Support.
The off meta champs cause lots of problems because most people don't know how to counter them.
And that is precisely why the meta is vehemently enforced by the community.
